question: What is the theme of the 2017 International Women's Day that is observed on 8 March every year?
option1: Planet 50-50 by 2030: Step It Up for Gender Equality
option2: Empowering Women, Empowering Humanity: Picture it!
option3: Equality for Women is Progress for All
option4: Women in the Changing World of Work: Planet 50-50 by 2030
answer: Women in the Changing World of Work: Planet 50-50 by 2030
